Class Zombie

public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
A Zombie. This Zombie is pretty boring. It needs to be made more interesting.
Author:
ram

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      A method that creates or returns an IntrinsicWeapon This method overrides the Actor.getIntrinsicWeapon()

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      If a Zombie can attack, it will. If not, it will chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - list of possible Actions
      lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
      map - the map where the current Zombie is
      display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed

    • dropZombieLimbs

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location dropZombieLimbs​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Location actorLocation, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      This method returns a possible Location where a ZombieArm or ZombieLeg can be dropped adjacently
      Parameters:
      actorLocation - the current location of the Zombie in the map
      map - the map in which the Zombie is currently in
